game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A local legend speaks of a powerful artifact hidden within the ruins of an ancient temple. Retrieve it and return to me, brave adventurer.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a magical amulet

tasks.description: Explore the nearby forest to find a hidden path leading to the temple.
Find and solve a mysterious puzzle within the temple's entrance hall to unlock the doors.
Once inside, navigate through treacherous traps and find the artifact on an altar.
